faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about the test calculator tool.

items.title: What is this calculator for?
items.description: This is a test calculator to demonstrate the dynamic tool discovery and registration system. It performs simple addition to verify the workflow.

items.title: How do I create my own tool?
items.description: Create a new folder in src/app/[locale]/(default)/tools with a page.tsx file and translation files. The system will automatically discover it.

items.title: Can I customize the styling?
items.description: Yes! You can customize the icon, color, category, and tags in src/lib/tools-config.ts for each tool.

items.title: Is it multilingual?
items.description: Absolutely! Add translation files in src/i18n/pages/tools/[tool-name] for each language you want to support.
